scripts.build:neokingdom: CURRENT_DAO=neokingdom pnpm codegen && pnpm generate:contracts-addresses:neokingdom && graph build
scripts.deploy-production:neokingdom: NETWORK=evmos pnpm build:neokingdom && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs $IPFS NeokingdomDAO/$FORK --network-file networks/neokingdom.json --network evmos
scripts.deploy-staging:neokingdom: NETWORK=tevmos pnpm build:neokingdom && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs $IPFS NeokingdomDAO/$FORK/staging --network-file networks/neokingdom.json --network tevmos
scripts.build:crowdpunk: CURRENT_DAO=crowdpunk pnpm codegen && pnpm generate:contracts-addresses:crowdpunk && graph build
scripts.deploy-production:crowdpunk: NETWORK=evmos pnpm build:crowdpunk && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs $IPFS CrowdpunkDAO --network-file networks/crowdpunk.json --network evmos
scripts.deploy-staging:crowdpunk: NETWORK=tevmos pnpm build:crowdpunk && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs $IPFS CrowdpunkDAO/staging --network-file networks/crowdpunk.json --network tevmos
scripts.build:teledisko: CURRENT_DAO=teledisko pnpm codegen && pnpm generate:contracts-addresses:teledisko && graph build
scripts.deploy-production:teledisko: NETWORK=evmos pnpm build:teledisko && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs $IPFS TelediskoDAO/$FORK --network-file networks/teledisko.json --network evmos
scripts.deploy-staging:teledisko: NETWORK=tevmos pnpm build:teledisko && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs $IPFS TelediskoDAO/$FORK/staging --network-file networks/teledisko.json --network tevmos
